alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 19 at 10:59AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. For the S. Buffalo River...including Sabin...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Buffalo River...including Hawley, Dilworth...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Buffalo River near Dilworth. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Gage not accessible above 15 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Thursday to 15.1 feet early Saturday morning. It will remain in flood stage into next week. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
